member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.ActivitiesController.List(System.Guid,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)

member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.ActivitiesController.Get(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a single activity by identifier.

member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.ActivitiesController.Create(EsgAsAService.Api.Models.ActivityRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new activity under a reporting period. Returns 201 Created with Location header to GET /activities/{{id}}.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.Importing.EnergyImportsController
member.summary: Ingests supplier energy CSVs by first staging the raw upload and then processing lines into normalized activities + scope entries. Why: decouple IO/parsing from domain writes and keep the flow idempotent across repeated uploads.

member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.Importing.EnergyImportsController.#ctor(EsgAsAService.Infrastructure.Data.EsgDbContext)
member.summary: Ingests supplier energy CSVs by first staging the raw upload and then processing lines into normalized activities + scope entries. Why: decouple IO/parsing from domain writes and keep the flow idempotent across repeated uploads.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.Importing.WasteImportsController
member.summary: Waste manifest import. Why: normalize quantity to kg and ensure idempotent processing by tracking a normalized payload-per-line per staging document.

member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.Importing.WasteImportsController.#ctor(EsgAsAService.Infrastructure.Data.EsgDbContext,EsgAsAService.Api.Services.IUnitConversionService)
member.summary: Waste manifest import. Why: normalize quantity to kg and ensure idempotent processing by tracking a normalized payload-per-line per staging document.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.Importing.WaterImportsController
member.summary: Water import flow stores the raw upload in staging and processes rows into WaterMeter records. Why: keep ingestion idempotent and flexible on units so we can safely re-run ETL and accept vendor CSVs.

member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.Importing.WaterImportsController.#ctor(EsgAsAService.Infrastructure.Data.EsgDbContext,EsgAsAService.Api.Services.IUnitConversionService)
member.summary: Water import flow stores the raw upload in staging and processes rows into WaterMeter records. Why: keep ingestion idempotent and flexible on units so we can safely re-run ETL and accept vendor CSVs.

member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.ReportsController.GenerateVsmeBasic(System.Guid)

member.name: M:EsgAsAService.Api.Controllers.ReportsController.GenerateJson(System.Guid)
member.summary: Generates the full ESG JSON report for a period (B1–B11, C placeholders). Feature-gated via FeatureManagement key FullEsgJson.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Services.IEmissionFactorCache
member.summary: Read‑through cache for emission factors by (country, year, type). Why: reduce DB load for hot lookups and provide simple TTL invalidation.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Services.ICalculationRunner
member.summary: Executes deterministic calculations for a period’s scope entries, enforcing preconditions (evidence or deviation) before computing CO2e.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Services.ICsvImportService
member.summary: Analyzes and imports CSV files to staging and core tables. Why: isolate parsing/mapping and keep controllers thin and testable.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Services.CsvImportService
member.summary: CSV import helper for energy activities. Why: keep parsing/mapping isolated and testable, and use UnitConversionService to normalize quantities up front to reduce downstream complexity.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Services.IUnitConversionService
member.summary: Converts quantities between units using UnitConversion rows. Why: normalize inputs early so downstream calculations stay simple.

member.name: T:EsgAsAService.Api.Services.IVsmeReportService
member.summary: Builds the VSME “basic” report from stored indicators for a period. Why: keeps aggregation logic separate from controllers and easy to test.
